## Example of an animated figure

```{python}
#| output: asis
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from pyfragments import AnimatedFigure

fig = plt.figure()
plt.xlim(0, 10)
plt.ylim(0, 10)
with AnimatedFigure(fig) as ani:
    for i in range(10):
        with ani.fragment():
            plt.scatter(i, i)

```
